# FIX$ ArcGIS Edition - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Python Flask web application integrating ArcGIS API for spatial analysis and interactive mapping of economic equity (EJV V2) calculations across geographic areas.

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Python Flask with ArcGIS Python API
- Frontend: HTML/CSS/JavaScript with ArcGIS JavaScript API 4.x
- Database: SQLite
- APIs: BLS OEWS, Census Bureau, ArcGIS Online

## Project Status
✅ Project structure created
⏳ Implementing backend and frontend
⏳ Installing dependencies
⏳ Testing and launch
